Text: There are a lot of people who upload a FLAC  album as 1 long track with a cue file to split, I wonder why then, when we have a mix album, it is invariably split into tracks, so you can't re-create the original mix effect................just wondering, but you can't really complain about free music!

You are certainly right, but I collected this collection from many albums and did not see sense to unite all it in an image of a disk
(FLAC+CUE)
Make comments - the collection was pleasant or not?
